Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2012 12:36AM SandraSummers wrote: Dear Beesie Thank you for the info...it is helpful in just piecing things together.  Yes, I had an unsuccessful biopsy, and the doctor/radiolist said I must do the lumpectomy.  So for now I await and think positive and hope for an unnerving false alarm.  I have read that the lumpectomy is not as bad as the needle biopsy, so that is encouraging.  I will send positive thoughts for you as well...
Posts.Title: 8mm bi-rad 5 SandraSummers SandraSummers

Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2012 12:39AM SandraSummers wrote: Dear Ysa I so appreciate the time you are taking to write a response.  I going from feeling very confident and not thinking about things, to obsessively thinking, googling, and checking this board.  I am going to try to keep busy until Thursday and plan on kicking this out of the park if need be! Thanks again...so appreciative
